para.text: The term “Authority” means the District of Columbia Financial Responsibility and Management Assistance Authority established under § 47-391.01(a);
The term “control period” has the meaning given such term under § 47-393(4) [§ 47-393(3)];
The term “District government” has the meaning given such term under § 47-393(5);
The term “financial plan and budget” has the meaning given such term under § 47-393(6); and
The term “Secretary” means the Secretary of the Treasury.

annotations.annotation: Budget and financial management, existing provisions and procedure and practice preserved, borrowing and spending limitations, see § 1-206.03.
